docs.title: Delphis Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to the official documentation for the Delphis Multistreaming App.

  • Terms and Conditions
  • Privacy Policy
  • Support

docs.title: Privacy Policy for Delphis
docs.text:
Effective Date: January 29, 2026

This Privacy Policy describes how Delphis (the "App"), developed and owned by an individual developer ("we", "us", or "our"), handles your information. By using the App, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

docs.title: 1. Data Ownership
docs.text: We are the sole owners of the information collected through this App. We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via registration, login, or other direct contact from you. We will not sell or rent this information to anyone.

docs.title: A. Authentication (Azure Entra ID)
docs.text: To use Delphis, you are required to sign up or log in using Azure Entra ID (External Identities). During this process, we collect: * Personal Identifiers: Such as your email address and name. * Authentication Tokens: Used to maintain your secure session. This data is used strictly for account management, security, and to personalize your experience.

docs.title: B. Analytics and Monitoring (PostHog & Microsoft Clarity)
docs.text: We use third-party tools to understand app performance and user behavior: * PostHog: Used for feature management (e.g., version updates) and event tracking (e.g., buttons clicked). * Microsoft Clarity: Used to capture how you interact with the App through session recordings and heatmaps. This helps us identify UI bugs and improve usability. * These tools may collect technical data such as device type, OS version, and interaction patterns.

docs.title: C. Stream Content (Pass-Through)
docs.text: We do not record, store, or have access to your live stream data. Delphis acts as a technical pass-through utility, transmitting data directly from your device to your selected third-party streaming platforms.

docs.title: 3. Third-Party Services
docs.text: Delphis integrates with third-party APIs (e.g., YouTube, Twitch). * When you stream to these platforms, their respective Privacy Policies apply. * YouTube Users: By using this App, you agree to be bound by the Google Privacy Policy.

docs.title: 4. Data Retention and Account Deletion
docs.text: We retain your personal information (name/email) as long as your account is active. * Right to Delete: You have the right to request the deletion of your account and all associated personal data at any time. * Deletion Process: To delete your account, please send an email to vikas32567@gmail.com from the email address associated with your account. We will process your request within a reasonable timeframe.

docs.title: 5. App Permissions
docs.text: To provide streaming services, the App requires: * Screen Recording & Microphone: To capture the content you wish to stream. * Network Access: To transmit data to streaming servers. * Background Service: To prevent stream interruption when the App is minimized.

docs.title: 6. Children’s Privacy
docs.text: We do not knowingly collect information from children under the age of 13. If we discover a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will delete it immediately.

docs.title: 7. Legal Disclosure
docs.text: We reserve the right to disclose your personal information as required by law (in jurisdictions including India, the USA, and the EU) and when we believe that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights or comply with a judicial proceeding.

docs.title: 8. Contact Information
docs.text: For any privacy-related inquiries or data requests, please contact: Email: vikas32567@gmail.com

docs.title: Terms and Conditions for Delphis
docs.text:
Last Updated: January 29, 2026

Welcome to Delphis. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the Delphis mobile application (the "App"). By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

docs.title: 1. Legal Agreement and Governing Law
docs.text: These Terms constitute a legal agreement between you (the "User") and the individual developer of Delphis. This agreement is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, the State of Delaware (USA), and the European Union (EU), without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

docs.title: 2. Nature of Service
docs.text: Delphis is a technical pass-through utility that enables users to stream their Android device screen to third-party platforms. * No Content Hosting: We do not host, store, or archive any media, video, or audio data streamed through the App. * Service "As-Is": The App is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. We provide no guarantee of uptime, service stability, or compatibility with future OS updates.

docs.title: 3. User Eligibility and Conduct
docs.text:
• Compliance: You must comply with all local, state, and international laws regarding online conduct and acceptable content.
  • Prohibited Content: You are strictly prohibited from streaming content that is:
    • Illegal, harmful, or threatening.
    • Infringing on any patent, trademark, trade secret, or copyright.
    • In violation of third-party privacy or publicity rights.
  • Right to Block: We reserve the unilateral right to block specific device IDs or accounts from accessing our services at any time, with or without cause, to maintain the safety and integrity of the App.

docs.title: 4. Third-Party Services
docs.text: The App integrates with third-party APIs (such as YouTube and Twitch). * Adherence to External Terms: By using Delphis, you agree to abide by the Terms of Service of any platform you stream to. * Independent Relationship: Delphis is not endorsed by, affiliated with, or a partner of these third-party services. We are not responsible for any account bans, strikes, or penalties incurred on those platforms.

docs.title: 5. Intellectual Property
docs.text: All rights, title, and interest in and to the App (excluding user-generated stream content) including the UI, code, and branding are and will remain the exclusive property of the developer. You may not decompile, reverse engineer, or attempt to extract the source code of the App.

docs.title: 6. Updates and Modifications
docs.text:
• Forced Updates: We may use tools like PostHog to manage feature flags and versions. We reserve the right to force an update to the latest version of the App. Failure to update may result in the immediate cessation of App functionality.
  • Future Pricing: While the App is currently free, we reserve the right to introduce fees, subscriptions, or tiered pricing at any time.

docs.title: 7. Limitation of Liability and Indemnification
docs.text:
• No Liability: In no event shall the developer be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, loss of data, loss of profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the App.
  • Indemnification: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless the developer from and against any claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debt (including attorney's fees) arising from your use of the App or your violation of these Terms.

docs.title: 8. Technical Disclaimers
docs.text:
• Data Usage: Streaming consumes high volumes of bandwidth. You are solely responsible for any mobile data charges or ISP fees.
  • Hardware: We are not responsible for any hardware damage, including but not limited to battery degradation or overheating caused by prolonged streaming.

docs.title: 9. Changes to Terms
docs.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the App following the posting of changes will mean that you accept and agree to the revisions.

docs.title: 10. Contact Information
docs.text: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact: Email: vikas32567@gmail.com
